casebody.data:
Michael A. D'ANTONIO, Plaintiff-Movant,
v.
RETAINED REALTY, INC., Defendant,
and
Network Trucking and Bergen County Sheriff's Department, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Patricia Egan, Defendant. M-1257 September Term 2018
M-1258 September Term 2018
082835 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 11, 2019

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a notice of petition for certification and petition for certification as within time (M-1257) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for leave to file a reply brief in support of the motion for leave to file as within time (M-1258) is denied.
